description:
Welcome to Mastering Periscope presented by Kelly Mirabella, one of the original team leaders of the PeriGirls group (The largest Periscope tribe). In this course you will not only learn the basics of how to use Periscope both as a viewer and as a broadcaster, but you will also walk away with more confidence to be on camera as well as numerous ideas and strategies for re-purposing your replays and allowing the content to live on.  This course includes over 15 short videos that mix concept and hands on training so you get one of the most comprehensive how to training for Periscope you can get.  Learn the why, when and how to truly master Periscope from someone who has been on it from the beginning. 

Why take this course over the others?  By taking a course from one of the PeriGirl leaders you can rest assured you are getting the best how to on Periscope you can get. Not only am I an active participant in the Periscope community, but I am also behind the largest Periscope tribes on internet!
title: Mastering Periscope
